thread.title: Flavia Pennetta suffers shock defeat in Tianjin Open
thread.title_full: Flavia Pennetta suffers shock defeat in Tianjin Open

title: Flavia Pennetta suffers shock defeat in Tianjin Open
text:
Flavia Pennetta suffers shock defeat in Tianjin Open 13 Oct 2015 07:46:53 
comments 
US Open champion Flavia Pennetta was eliminated by a player 408 places below her in the world rankings in a major first-round upset at the Tianjin Open. 
Ukrainian qualifier Lyudmila Kichenok ousted the top seed in straight sets in China to claim by far the biggest win of her career. 
Kichenok broke serve twice to win the first set and took her fifth break point of the second set to lead 3-2. 
Pennetta broke back to level at 5-5 but the world number 414 won two games in succession to complete a superb 6-3 7-5 win. Related Sport News
